title: Giphy GIFs are not displayed
body:
**Describe the bug**
GIFs from Giphy are not displayed

**Expected behavior**
The GIF is embedded

**Screenshots**
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/02641bfd-3193-4849-b96f-57c19fee2a75)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Pop!_OS 22.04 LTS
 - Installation package flatpak
 - Version 1.11.0
